name: Please, Don't Die
description:
content warning: discussions of suicide and death.

in 2015 someone I loved took their own life. In 2018, I started a one day game jam: "games to save lives"

Dedicated to Skylar.

NOTE ON PRICING: I want my games to be accessible for as many people as possible! If $5 is more than you can afford, please contact me directly by emailing me (vnguyen@mica.edu).
